document.full_text: citibank  said a former employee had committed fraud in indonesia and sought to reassure card clients on saturday, a day after the central bank slapped lengthy bans on its credit card and wealth management businesses.
document.title: citi says former indonesia employee committed fraud
lines_and_colors: citibank  said a former employee had committed fraud in indonesia and sought to reassure card clients on saturday, a day after the central bank slapped lengthy bans on its credit card and wealth management businesses.
